page.title: 04EVENTS IN NAILSWORTH AREA
page.content: {Nailsworth}is a small town which follows tradition.Annually it has a Spring Festival with things like bicycle races up the {"W",}exhibitions and displays.Local Churches all have their own fetes and festivals.{ {St.Georges}has a Flower Festival where the Church is decorated with flowers to encourage people to go in. {Minchinhampton}has the delights of a {Medieval Fayre.}It occurs every 2 years and events taking place are fancy dress,singing and side shows. Also a funfair takes place annually on {Minchinhampton Common.} In {Box}the residents open their gardens to the public annually which is very colourful. The local schools also have their own fetes with entertainment such as gym displays and country dancing.
